About me

My name is Ziming Ji and I am a Master student in Astrophysical Sciences and Technology Program at the Rochester Institute of Technology in NY USA. My Master project focuses on the identification of Supermassive Binary Black Holes (SMBBHs). I simulate the SMBBHs simulation data using CLOUDY and analyze the output data.

Research Interest

  • Supermassive Binary black holes
  • Active Galactic Nuclei

Research Projects

1. Study of the Behaviors of Time-Varied SEDs emitted by BLRs around SMBBHs

2. Spectroscopic Analysis of OH-MegaMaser Galaxy IRAS 11506-3851

Education

  • Master in Astrophysics Science of Technology, Sep 2022 - present
  • Bachalor in Physics & Astronomy, Sep 2019 - May 2022
